Enrollment Requirements: Pre-requisite: Students must have taken, be currently enrolled, or concurrently registered for RTVF 190 for the upcoming quarter.
Add Consent: Department Consent Required
title: SoC RTVF 370-0-20 Topics in Pre-Production

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Students will learn the fundamentals of independent/low-budget film producing, from pre-production through final delivery. Emphasis will be placed on both applied research and hands-on practice through serving as producer on a student short film in pre-production or production during the quarter. You will be required to deliver an end-of-quarter pitch presentation supplying a detailed schedule and budget for the short film to which you are attached as producer.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Attendance/participation, one short essay, one scheduling exercise and one final pitch presentation which includes a full shooting schedule and budget.
